description: Live video and text coverage as holders Cliftonville go up against Championship side Ards at Windsor Park.
title: Cliftonville through to Irish Cup final after Ards win - as it happened
title_page: Cliftonville through to Irish Cup final after Ards win - as it happened - BBC Sport
maintext:
That's a wrap!
FT: Cliftonville 3-0 Ards
That's all from us tonight as Cliftonville book their place in the Irish Cup final in May.
We'll be back tomorrow with live text coverage and a live stream on BBC iPlayer from the other semi-final, when Dungannon Swifts face Bangor.
You can read the report from the game here.
Thanks for joining us tonight. Good evening!
GOAL- Cliftonville 2-0 Ards
Alex Parsons- 73mins
Alex Parsons beats his marker and is on hand to nod home Rory Hale's curling cross to give Cliftonville a more comfortable lead.
It had been a nervy last few minutes for the Reds so Jim Magilton will be delighted that his side have extended their advantage.
